name: My homepage
desc: Inspired by modern style, with a touch of subtle lightness. Combination of block and slim and 3d interfaces. I built this project from ideation, project process management, planning, visual design and coding for the entire site content.

content.title: Nextjs/Javascript
content.desc: Tech, i use to build fullstack site.

content.title: Trello
content.desc: I use for planning and managing.

content.title: Adobe Photoshop
content.desc: I use for editing and processing raster/pixel images.

content.title: Adobe Illustrator
content.desc: I use for editing and designing vector images.

content.title: Paint 3D
content.desc: I use for draw simple path in 3D images.

content.title: Vscode
content.desc: I use for primary IDE coding.

content.title: Neovim
content.desc: I use for editing single file coding.

content.title: Material Design
content.desc: Google style, i use for layouts and blocks.

content.title: Apple Design
content.desc: Apple style, i use for effects and animations.

content.title: Fluent Design
content.desc: Microsoft style, i use for icons.

content.title: Source Sans Pro
content.desc: The sans-serif style that I use for content of site.

content.title: Signika Negative
content.desc: The sans-serif style that I use for title of site.

content.title: Roboto Mono
content.desc: The monospace style that I use for code content.

content.title: Roboto Slab
content.desc: The serif style that I use for highlight text.

content.title: Merienda
content.desc: The cursive style that I use as handwrite of special title.

content.title: Lobster Two
content.desc: The cursive style that I use detail text highlight
